scripts.patch-serial: replace 'serializeBinary(): Uint8Array { throw new Error("Method not implemented."); }' 'serializeBinary(): Uint8Array { return this.serialize(); }' -- src/*Proto.ts
scripts.patch-return:
replace 'return writer.getResultBuffer();' 'return writer.getResultBuffer();
        return undefined;' -- src/*Proto.ts
scripts.patch-reader: replace -s 'Uint8Array ? new pb_1.BinaryReader(bytes) : bytes' 'pb_1.BinaryReader ? bytes : new pb_1.BinaryReader(bytes)' --  src/*Proto.ts
scripts.patch: npm run patch-reader; npm run patch-return; npm run patch-serial
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run protots; npm run patch; npm run tsc
